name: Establishes Prime Factorization
description: Establishes the theorem and mathematical framework for the unique decomposition of dynamical processes into temporal prime elements.
subject: urn:uor:resource:temporal-prime-decomposition
contextualDescription: The Temporal Prime Decomposition resource establishes the Temporal Prime Factorization Theorem that extends the fundamental theorem of arithmetic to dynamical systems, enabling the unique factorization of any time-dependent process into temporal prime elements.
